description: Exports processed data to the data storage. This process aims to be compatible to GDAL/OGR formats and options. This process may not be supported by back-ends in the context of secondary web services.

format.description: The file format to export to. It must be one of the values that the server reports as supported output formats, which usually correspond to the short GDAL/OGR codes. This parameter is *case insensitive*.

options.description: The file format options to be used for exporting. Must correspond to the options that the server reports as supported options for the chosen `format`. The option names and valid values usually correspond to the GDAL/OGR format options.
